Infera Intelligence Almanac

Crafted to the Agents playbook - curated intelligence, benchmarks, and learning pipelines with automation-readable foundations.

Learning Studio

Curated Tracks for Builder Teams

Seven research-backed programs covering prompts, RAG, agents, reliability and multimodal craft. Each track pairs battle-tested resources, applied tasks, and a capstone deliverable so your team ships production-grade AI faster.

8 Tracks24 Modules61+ Hours of Practice
Advanced8 Hrs3 ModulesBadge: Cognitive Architect

Reasoning-Native Engineering

Architect applications that leverage test-time compute, chain-of-thought verification, and self-correction loops.

Signature Modules

  • Thinking Chains & Test-Time Compute

    Master the paradigm shift from zero-shot prompting to verifiable reasoning chains.

  • Monte Carlo Tree Search (MCTS) Agents

    Build agents that explore multiple future paths before committing to an action.

Capstone

Autonomous Developer

Create a CLI tool that plans, codes, debugs, and verifies a small feature implementation using a reasoning loop.

Deliverable: GitHub repository with the 'Agentic Loop' logic and demonstration video.

Awarded for mastering reasoning-heavy architectures.

View track>
Beginner5 Hrs3 ModulesBadge: Prompt Architect

Prompt Engineering Foundations

Understand LLM fundamentals, craft reliable prompts, and evaluate responses with lightweight checklists.

Signature Modules

  • LLM Basics & Mental Models

    Learn how LLMs process instructions, tokens, and safety constraints.

  • Core Prompt Patterns

    Apply patterns such as role prompting, structured output, and self-checks.

Capstone

Prompt System Playbook

Assemble a short prompt playbook for your team with patterns, guardrails, and evaluation scores.

Deliverable: Notion or Google Doc with prompt templates plus evaluation results.

Awarded for documenting prompt patterns with evaluation evidence.

View track>
Beginner6 Hrs3 ModulesBadge: Open Model Engineer

Open-Source LLMs with Ollama

Stand up local LLM inference, quantization, and prompt tooling with Ollama + open models.

Signature Modules

  • Local Setup

    Install Ollama and run baseline models.

  • Prompt Tooling

    Layer in prompt libraries and evaluate outputs.

Capstone

Local Model Service

Bundle an Ollama mod file + FastAPI server for a specialized prompt workflow.

Deliverable: Dockerfile and README describing the local deployment steps.

Awarded for deploying optimized open-source LLMs.

View track>
Intermediate7 Hrs3 ModulesBadge: Automation Pilot

AI Automation with n8n

Compose automations that blend LLM calls with business APIs, observability, and human-in-the-loop reviews inside n8n.

Signature Modules

  • Workflow Fundamentals

    Navigate n8n, understand triggers, and configure environment variables securely.

  • LLM Nodes & Guardrails

    Wire LLM nodes, retries, and moderation into automated flows.

Capstone

Automation Control Center

Ship an n8n automation that triages inbound requests, logs metrics, and includes executive-ready reporting.

Deliverable: Workflow export + short Loom demonstrating success/failure paths.

Awarded for orchestrating resilient automations with guardrails.

View track>
Intermediate10 Hrs3 ModulesBadge: RAG Builder

RAG in a Weekend

Ship a retrieval microservice that indexes docs and returns grounded answers with evals.

Signature Modules

  • Retrieval Foundations

    Understand vector databases, embeddings, and chunking strategies.

  • Retriever + LLM Pipeline

    Implement retrieval chaining and response synthesis.

Capstone

Grounded Support Assistant

Build a RAG assistant over your company handbook with source citations and evaluation dashboard.

Deliverable: GitHub repo + short loom walkthrough of the assistant flow.

Awarded for shipping a production-ready retrieval assistant.

Agents 101 (Tools & Functions)

Design agents that orchestrate tools safely using function calling and guardrails.

Signature Modules

  • Agent Patterns

    Survey single vs. multi-agent architectures and planning loops.

  • Tooling & Orchestration

    Implement tool registration and result parsing.

Capstone

Analyst Assistant

Build an agent that ingests CSV data, runs tool-based insights, and returns an executive summary.

Deliverable: Notebook or service with evaluation logs + summary sample.

Awarded for shipping a resilient tool-using agent.

    Capture spans, prompts, and tool invocations for debugging.

    Automate regression suites and safety checks for releases.

Capstone

Agent Reliability Dashboard

Multimodal Creation Studio

Prototype end-to-end multimodal experiences spanning image, audio, and video synthesis with alignment controls.

Signature Modules

  • Image & Video Foundations

    Work with diffusion, temporal attention, and control nets.

  • Audio & Voice Layers

    Blend speech synthesis, Foley, and soundtrack generation.

Capstone

Multimodal Launch Kit
